root.name: Masters New: Harukanaru Augusta 3
root.description: Part of the Harukanaru Augusta franchise.Masters Harukanaru Augusta 3 was released in 1994 for the 3DO.Harukanaru Augusta 3 was released in 1995 for the Sega Saturn.
